line: Emperor: Welcome.
You must be my newest personal legionary.
I believe your name was Silvius.
I trust that you know who I am?
Of course you do!
I am your Emperor.
Every good roman soldier knows me.
Go talk to my adviser Claudius.
He will give you a task.
I expect it to be completed quickly!
Emperor: I gave you a task.
Stop delaying and get it done!
Adviser Claudius: Greetings.
The Emperor requires you to travel
to the land of Egypt.
There has been a disturbance there.
I am sure its nothing...
Some peasants are claiming that Anubis
has gained access to our world.
Apparently Egypt is already under his control.
Some even say he has prophesied the death
of our beloved Emperor.
Travel to Egypt to prove it wrong.
The journey will be long and dangerous.
There are barbarians occupying the way there.
You need to deal with them too.
You should leave immediately.
Get going already!!
Scout: You must be the one the Emperor sent.
Turn back now if you value your life.
Anubis has taken over all of Egypt!!!
The rumours were all true.
Scout: I warned you...
